title: A.D. Lousada
text:
Associação Desportiva de Lousada or simply AD Lousada is a <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> club, based in <a href="Lousada">Lousada</a>, district of <a href="Porto">Porto</a>. The club has various sports, specially <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a>, <a href="field%20hockey">field hockey</a> and <a href="basketball">basketball</a>.
Football (soccer).
League Cup and History.
"As of April 14, 2009"
